MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:18pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Dumbarton Local substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
